thread.title: Dramatic video shows teens fall through ice on Central Park pond
thread.title_full: Dramatic video shows teens fall through ice on Central Park pond

author: LARRY McSHANE
title: Dramatic video shows teens fall through ice on Central Park pond
text:
SEE IT: Horrifying video shows 7 teens struggling after fall through ice on Central Park pond Dramatic video shows teens fall through ice on Central Park pond NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  14 AM 
The seven selfie-shooting teens who plunged through the ice of a Central Park lake screamed, splashed and fought desperately to escape the frigid waters. 
“Help!” one of the sinking youths clearly shouts in a dramatic video clip aired exclusively Tuesday by WNBC-TV . 
The brief video captures the panicked teens trying frantically and unsuccessfully to free themselves from the chilly pond. Seven teens fell through ice in Central Park on Monday. Rescuers were able to grab them from the frigid waters. 
The septet, all ages 15 or 16, apparently wandered out on the ice to snap a photo — only to discover the ice wasn’t thick enough to maintain that much weight. Police and park visitors gather after the teens were rescued from the lake. (James Keivom/New York Daily News) 
Witnesses said they were talking pictures and jumping around just before the ice cracked beneath their feet, leaving the youths scrambling for their lives. 
Authorities said all seven victims were taken to local hospitals for treatment of hypothermia after they were rescued around 6 p.m. One of the teens is taken away in a stretcher after the fall. 
A pair of male models were among the rescuers who plucked the boys from the icy lake.
